author: Jason Gay
title: What Is This Bull…pen Cart!?
text:
I’ve been a baseball crank for a while now—arguing its games are too long, too expensive for a family to attend, and the sport is too presumptive about its status as an essential pastime. Have you asked a 10-year-old kid if they’d rather watch a baseball game or “American Ninja Warrior”? Yeah. Tomorrow isn’t promised to baseball.
(Tomorrow isn’t promised to any activity, by the way. Ask a 10-year-old kid if they’ve read a newspaper this morning. Actually, don’t. I’ll just weep.)
